Header: Conspiracies to remove President Sirisena from SLFP chairman role will not succeed: Minister Zoysa (Watch video)
Content: Minister Vijith Vijayamuni Zoysa says conspiracies to remove President Maithripala Sirisena as chairman of the SLFP will not be successful. He made this statement responding to questions at an event held on Tuesday. The minister stated that according to the party’s constitution, if the executive president is from the Sri Lanka Freedom Party or the United People’s Freedom Alliance, he will be the chairman of the party.
